pullRequest.body:
The middle term of a three term exact sequence with outer terms Noetherian is Noetherian. 

---

nodes.body: Also please start the PR title with `feat:` or `chore:` etc. See https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/commit.html for details.
Kind reminder: this still fails CI
Sorry, I was headed into a movie and trying to get the PR fixed on my phone before it started (I did not succeed).
maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.
No worries. Thanks for the contribution!

Thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8857876040/job/24325868380)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8857876040/job/24325868299)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8857876040/job/24325868559)
Is there a reason behind the rename?

Consistency with `isNoetherian_submodule`, or I guess `isNoetherian_submodule'`. I don't feel strongly about it and would be fine reverting to the previous name (this would not require reverting the changes to other files, and I think it's better to use `inferInstanceAs` vs using an instance name when possible)

Sure. Can you add
```
@[deprecated] alias Submodule.Quotient.isNoetherian := isNoetherian_quotient -- deprecated on 2024-04-27
```
to the next line?
Done.

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion -- deprecated on 2024-04-27 ```
